articles.title: Mascara: What is the TikTok trend all about? - BBC
articles.description: TikTok loves a code word, and its latest has caused a stir. But is it a good way to share?
articles.content:
TikTok fan? Chances are you've seen a lot of people talking about mascara recently - but it isn't about make-up.

articles.title: Radio 2 loses half a million listeners as old favourites leave the station - Express
articles.description: Radio 2 DJs Steve Wright, Paul O'Grady and Ken Bruce are some of the latest presenters to step down and be replaced on their daytime radio shows.
